text:
Здравейте,

 

Бихте ли потвърдили салдата по сделки с ERU, описани в приложения файл, моля.

 

Поздрави,

Елена Ковачки

Ръководител „Администрация и Бек Офис“

Отдел „Търговия с природен газ“

Моб: +359 893 659 834

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com> 

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД



 



 

From: Anna Riabchenko <anna.riabchenko@eru.com.ua> 
Sent: Tuesday, June 4, 2024 7:49 PM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>
Cc: Anna Agapova <anna.agapova@eru.com.ua>; Yuliya Polyanchuk <yuliya.polyanchuk@eru.com.ua>; Nataliia Balytska <nataliia.balytska@eru.com.ua>
Subject: RE: Balance confirmation on 31.12.2023

 

Dear partners, good day!

Unfortunately, we have not received a response to our request.

Could you please revert with a signed reconciliation report for 2023 or with your commentary?

We will be grateful for your prompt response.

 

 

----------

Kind regards,

Anna Riabchenko

E-mail: anna.riabchenko@eru.com.ua <mailto:anna.riabchenko@eru.com.ua> 

 

From: Anna Riabchenko <anna.riabchenko@eru.com.ua <mailto:anna.riabchenko@eru.com.ua> >
